Key Match Events: Kyle Gibson pitched 7 strong innings for the Cardinals
Brendan Donovan hit a home run with 3 RBIs for the Cardinals
Giancarlo Stanton had 3 RBIs for the Yankees
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Yankees needed to win by 2 runs or more to cover the spread but did not
The over/under was 9.5 and the teams scored 11 runs, so people who bet the over won
Others: Will Warren (NYY) lost the game with 4 ER in 4.0 IP
